DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy and the safety of KUC-7483 in overactive bladder patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Confirmatory Study of KUC-7483 in Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Patients with a symptom of overactive bladder for more than 6 months. Patients who meet the following condition during the 3day bladder diary period. the mean number of micturitions per 24 hours is ≥8 times the mean number of urgency episodes per 24 hours is ≥1 time Patients who are diagnosed as stress urinary incontinence are predominant. Patients with urinary calculus, interstitial cystitis, or clinically significant urinary tract infection.
